content.title: Funding
content.paragraph: Are you a start up company or investor having a hard time getting funding due to lack of years in business? Look no further as Mogul Management specializes in attaining funding for our clients based solely off their credit profile. We specialize in funding Startups and Early Stage business owners with our core product being Unsecured Credit Cards with Line of Credit Capability. Funding amount ranges from 15k - 150k.
list: Cost to client: Success-based fee, no upfront fees, based on the total funding amount
Funding under 35k+ = 11.99%. Funding over 35k = 9.99% (Ex. Client funding for 50k would be invoiced $4,995)
